title: Kaspersky Anti-Virus 2009 v 8.0.0.357- Final => June 2008
description:
Kaspersky AV provides all types of anti-virus protection:anti-virus scanners, monitors, behavior blockers and integrity checkers
The Kaspersky Anti-Virus 2009 application was designed to be the backbone of your PC?s security system, offering protection from a range of IT threats.

Kaspersky Anti-Virus 2009 provides the basic tools needed to protect your PC.

Here are some key features of "Kaspersky Anti-Virus 2009"

Essential Protection

Ã‚Â· Protects from viruses, Trojans and worms
Ã‚Â· Blocks spyware and adware
Ã‚Â· Scans files in real time (on access) and on demand
Ã‚Â· Scans email messages (regardless of email client)
Ã‚Â· Scans Internet traffic (regardless of browser)
Ã‚Â· Protects instant messengers (ICQ, MSN)
Ã‚Â· Provides proactive protection from unknown threats
Ã‚Â· Scans Java and Visual Basic scripts

Preventive Protection

Ã‚Â· Scans operating system and installed applications for vulnerabilities
Ã‚Â· Analyzes and closes Internet Explorer vulnerabilities
Ã‚Â· Disables links to malware sites
Ã‚Â· Detects viruses based on the packers used to compress code
Ã‚Â· Global threat monitoring (Kaspersky Security Network)

Advanced Protection & Recovery

Ã‚Â· The program can be installed on infected computers
Ã‚Â· Self-protection from being disabled or stopped
Ã‚Â· Restores correct system settings after removing malicious software
Ã‚Â· Tools for creating a rescue disk
Ã‚Â· Data & Identity Theft Protection
Ã‚Â· Disables links to fake (phishing) websites
Ã‚Â· Blocks all types of keyloggers

Usability

Ã‚Â· Automatic configuration during installation
Ã‚Â· Wizards for common tasks
Ã‚Â· Visual reports with charts and diagrams
Ã‚Â· Alerts provide all the information necessary for informed user decisions
Ã‚Â· Automatic or interactive mode
Ã‚Â· Round-the-clock technical support
Ã‚Â· Automatic database updates

Requirements:

Ã‚Â· Intel Pentium 800 MHz 32 bit (x86) / 64 bit (x64) or higher (or equivalent)
Ã‚Â· 512 MB available RAM
Ã‚Â· 50 MB free space on the hard drive
Ã‚Â· CD-ROM (for installation of the program from CD)
Ã‚Â· computer mouse
Ã‚Â· Internet connection (for product activation)
Ã‚Â· Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.5 or higher (for downloading updates)
Ã‚Â· Microsoft Windows Installer 2.0
